application.name: InsideMeter
application.philosophy: When you see clearly, you live differently

purpose.primary: Help users understand emotional patterns through daily mood tracking and lunar cycle correlation
purpose.secondary: Provide AI-powered insights for emotional wellness and personal growth
purpose.therapeutic_value: Supports mental health awareness through self-reflection and pattern recognition

core: Daily mood tracking with intensity levels (1-10 scale)
Automatic lunar phase correlation for each mood entry

mental_health: Track mood fluctuations for therapy discussions
Monitor progress in mental health treatment
Practice mindful awareness of emotional states
research: Explore correlations between lunar cycles and emotions
Study impact of activities on mood

target_audience.primary: Individuals seeking emotional wellness and self-awareness
target_audience.secondary: Mental health conscious individuals interested in data-driven insights
target_audience.age_range: 13+ (general public with parental guidance for minors)

scientific_basis.mood_tracking: Evidence-based approach to emotional awareness and mental health monitoring
scientific_basis.lunar_correlation: Exploratory analysis of anecdotal connections between moon phases and human emotions
scientific_basis.ai_insights: Machine learning algorithms trained on emotional wellness research and therapeutic practices
scientific_basis.disclaimer: Insights are for educational purposes and do not replace professional mental health care

technology_stack.frontend: React 18 with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui components
technology_stack.ai_integration: OpenAI GPT-4 for advanced analytics and insights
technology_stack.security: bcrypt encryption, secure session management, HTTPS enforcement

wellness_philosophy.mindfulness: Encouraging present-moment awareness of emotional states
wellness_philosophy.non_judgmental: Promoting acceptance and understanding rather than judgment
wellness_philosophy.empowerment: Giving users tools for self-discovery and personal growth
wellness_philosophy.evidence_based: Grounding insights in psychological research and best practices
wellness_philosophy.privacy_first: Ensuring user data remains completely private and secure

common_questions.what_is_insidemeter: InsideMeter is an AI-powered mood tracking application that helps users understand their emotional patterns through daily logging and lunar cycle correlation analysis.
common_questions.how_lunar_correlation_works: The app records the current moon phase when you log your mood and analyzes correlations over time to identify potential patterns between lunar cycles and emotional states.
common_questions.privacy_and_security: All mood data and journal entries are encrypted and private. Users have complete control over their data with options to export or delete at any time.
common_questions.ai_insights_explanation: Pro subscribers receive advanced AI analysis including mood predictions, journal sentiment analysis, pattern recognition, and personalized wellness recommendations.
common_questions.who_can_benefit: Anyone interested in emotional wellness, self-awareness, mental health monitoring, or understanding their emotional patterns can benefit from InsideMeter.
common_questions.scientific_validity: While mood tracking is evidence-based for mental health awareness, lunar correlations are exploratory and based on user interest rather than established scientific consensus.

contact_information.mission: Empowering mindful awareness through innovative wellness technology since 2014
contact_information.response_time: Within 24 hours for Pro subscribers, 48-72 hours for free users
